languages.text: "Священное братство разведчиков. Культ Механикус отправляет нас к границам известных секторов как исследователей и завоевателей. Мы — воины Кода, возвращающиеся на потерянные миры и посвятившие себя поиску утраченных знаний древних".

traits.locale_text: "Священное братство разведчиков. Культ Механикус отправляет нас к границам известных секторов как исследователей и завоевателей. Мы — воины Кода, возвращающиеся на потерянные миры и посвятившие себя поиску утраченных знаний древних".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Священное братство разведчиков. Культ Механикус отправляет нас к границам известных секторов как исследователей и завоевателей. Мы — воины Кода, возвращающиеся на потерянные миры и посвятившие себя поиску утраченных знаний древних".

traits.locale_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们都是神圣的开拓者。我们是机械修会的研究者与征服者，奉机械修会的命令，前往已知领域的边疆。我们是神圣代码的战士，我们回到那些已被遗忘的世界，致力于恢复早已失落的古代知识。”
languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “我们都是神圣的开拓者。我们是机械修会的研究者与征服者，奉机械修会的命令，前往已知领域的边疆。我们是神圣代码的战士，我们回到那些已被遗忘的世界，致力于恢复早已失落的古代知识。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «La sagrada hermandad de exploradores. El Culto Mechanicus nos envía a los confines de los sectores conocidos como investigadores y conquistadores. Somos guerreros del código que vuelven a los mundos perdidos para recuperar el saber ancestral olvidado».
languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «La sagrada hermandad de exploradores. El Culto Mechanicus nos envía a los confines de los sectores conocidos como investigadores y conquistadores. Somos guerreros del código que vuelven a los mundos perdidos para recuperar el saber ancestral olvidado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「探検家の神聖な同胞体。機械教団は我々を研究者として、また征服者として既知の領域の辺境に送り出したのだ。我々は失われた世界に戻り、失われた古代の知識を回復することに専念するコードの戦士である」
languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「探検家の神聖な同胞体。機械教団は我々を研究者として、また征服者として既知の領域の辺境に送り出したのだ。我々は失われた世界に戻り、失われた古代の知識を回復することに専念するコードの戦士である」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die heilige Bruderschaft der Entdecker. Der Kult Mechanicus schickt uns an die Grenzen der bekannten Sektoren, als Forscher und Eroberer. Wir sind die Krieger des Codes, die zu den verlorenen Welten zurückkehren und uns der Aufgabe widmen, das verlorene uralte Wissen zu bergen."
languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Die heilige Bruderschaft der Entdecker. Der Kult Mechanicus schickt uns an die Grenzen der bekannten Sektoren, als Forscher und Eroberer. Wir sind die Krieger des Codes, die zu den verlorenen Welten zurückkehren und uns der Aufgabe widmen, das verlorene uralte Wissen zu bergen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Ce sont les membres de la confrérie sacrée des explorateurs. Le Culte Mechanicus nous envoie à la frontière des secteurs connus, aussi bien en tant que chercheurs qu'en tant que conquérants. Nous sommes les guerriers du Code qui retournent dans les mondes perdus et mettent tout en œuvre pour retrouver les connaissances tombées dans l'oubli. »
languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont les membres de la confrérie sacrée des explorateurs. Le Culte Mechanicus nous envoie à la frontière des secteurs connus, aussi bien en tant que chercheurs qu'en tant que conquérants. Nous sommes les guerriers du Code qui retournent dans les mondes perdus et mettent tout en œuvre pour retrouver les connaissances tombées dans l'oubli. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

languages.text: "Kâşiflerden oluşan kutsal bir cemiyettir. Cult Mechanicus bizi bilinen sektörlerdeki cephelerde araştırmacı ve fatih olarak gönderir. Bizler yitik dünyalara dönen, kendilerini kayıp ve kadim irfanı geri kazanmaya adamış Kod savaşçılarıyız."
languages.original_text: "The sacred fraternity of explorers. The Cult Mechanicus sends us out to the frontiers of the known sectors as researchers and conquerors. We are the warriors of the Code who return to the lost worlds and devote themselves to recovering the lost ancient knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Kâşiflerden oluşan kutsal bir cemiyet. Cult Mechanicus bizi bilinen sektörlerdeki cephelerde araştırmacı ve fatih olarak gönderir. Bizler kayıp dünyalara dönen ve kendilerini kayıp ve kadim irfanı geri kazanmaya adayan Kod savaşçılarıyız."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
